Original_notes: plots cultivated every 6th yr. on the average; but trees do grow up in the fields during fallow
irrigation [underlined]; probably would be formed anyway; irrigation used only during dry season
Fences are erected communally against animal depredation; to keep out bushbucks
(+); “Should there be no heirs, the property is divided among members of the deceased’s village”
(-); war parties were of 20 to 30 men, never exceeded 100
(+); some men may own hundreds of cattle, and others only 10 goats, but they wear clothing and live under conditions precisely alike
(-); in the event of murder or manslaughter, the elders fixed the compensation to be paid
